channel.title: Home on Foobits focuses on delivering high-performance and scalable enterprise solutions using latest web, mobile technology stack and design.
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Foobits focuses on delivering high-performance and scalable enterprise solutions using latest web, mobile technology stack and design.

item.title: Careers
item.description: Join our team Every Foobers is unique. They are known for pushing things forward, right from process to technology. Have the drive to be great? Join us. Home Careers OPEN POSITIONS There is no open positions right now. Keep in touch.

item.title: Case Study
item.description: CASE STUDIES From machine learning to movies, we analyze almost anything and this is where we jot down our thoughts. We don't take sides, we just write when the thought crosses our mind. Home Case Study OUR CASE STUDIES Keep in touch. We will publish our case studies here.

item.title: Company
item.description: About Company QUALITY. DELIVERED. Home About Company Company Team Values Press WE ARE A GLOBAL EMERGING TECHNOLOGY CONSULTANCY. Companies come to us to solve some of the most complex business problems others couldn't. We are a different kind of company. No nonsense, no jargons, no wasting time. You pick up the call, talk to us, and you will realize that we're all straight talk.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Us Hey there! We love talking to our potential customers, fans, haters and people who've got some feedback for us. Let's go! Home Contact WRITE TO US BUSINESS business@foobits.com PRESS & MEDIA friends@foobits.com CAREERS hr@foobits.com TALK TO US Your name Email Phone number Your message Send messagge Congratulations. Your message has been sent successfully Error, please retry.

item.title: Press
item.description: Press FEEL FREE TO GET IN TOUCH. Home About Press Company Team Values Press SSSH... TALK TO US Hello dear friend from media, please feel free to use this template we have for you. If there's anything you need more from us, drop us an email. GET IN TOUCH

item.title: Products
item.description: Our Products Foobits's product teams work hard to make products that shape the future, one step at a time. Home Products PeekPost Push Notification Marketing App allows spam free web push notification communication with Customers. VISIT PEEKPOST Fipple TV Fipple.tv is a new age entertainment platform. We are the global,multi-platform media and entertainment company. We share the best of the web culture and whatâ€™s trending VISIT FIPPLE TV Rollzup Bookmarks are for books, not browsers.

item.title: Services
item.description: Our Services From building complex systems like data compression servers to building artificially intelligent machines, we've been there, done that. Home Services WEB DESIGNS Our goal is to add substance and beauty to the products we build for our customers. And they understand it. WEB DEVELOPMENT We build transformational cloud applications that are modular, secure and ready-to-scale at incredible speed.

item.title: Team
item.description: About Team DEDICATED TO OUR CLIENT'S SUCCESS. Home About Team Company Team Values Press We do the best work of our life here, and we make sure that everyone has the right opportunity to grow exponentially in their careers. THE GOOD PEOPLE OF FOOBITS Boobalan Muthukumaran Founder and ceo Check out https://boobalan.

item.title: Values
item.description: Our Values WE BREATHES THESE CORE VALUES EVERY SINGLE MINUTE. Home About Values Company Team Values Press FOOBITS FAMILY'S CORE VALUES Be Humble. Embrace Creativity. Breathe the Mission. Build a positive team spirit. Guts over fear. Always. Do more with less. Respect the differences. LETS WORK TOGETHER We work with companies who are looking to grow, go big and influence people's lives for real.

item.title: Why Future
item.description: Why document.write((new Date().getFullYear()) + 5);? The future starts today, not tomorrow. So, we aiming at the future always. -Boobalan Muthukumaran
